alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 03 at 11:38PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Mitchell and southeastern Jewell Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1138 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glen Elder, or 11 miles west of Beloit, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jewell around 1150 PM CDT. Randall around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Montrose and Formoso. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
